text: Iâ€™ve visited Dr. Lim for several years now, I think of her as my family physician in Singapore. She is an incredibly empathetic woman, really compassionate and very kind.  She takes the time to make a thorough diagnosis and clearly explain treatment options with follow ups. The front desk experience is also very welcoming and efficient.

My experience with Dr Lim was very smooth. The staff at the reception was polite and informative. Dr Lim made me feel comfortable and at ease. She was very thorough in asking about my medical history to diagnose me accurately and answering my questions. What I appreciated the most about my visit was that she asked me for my medication preferences, instead of prescribing me a host of unnecessary medications. I left with the confidence that my case had been handled with care and compassion.

Dr. Lim is very attentive and cares about the patient. Asks questions and have a conversation with the patient. She is extremely polite and takes time to explain potential diagnosis. One of the best GP's I ever went in Singapore. Truly appreciate her attitude! Thank you
Dr Lim is very professional, thorough, kind and patient. She is detail-oriented and explained my condition extremely well. Thank you, Dr Lim.

Dr Lin is very meticulous, serious in her work, measures your blood pressure with sphygmometer and stethoscope properly elevated to get accurate readings, advises you on how to keep calm  unlike other clinics which uses the electronic blood pressure monitor with a press of a button
